text: Francis O'Farrell (9 October 1927 â€“ 6 March 2022) was an Irish football player and manager. O'Farrell played as a wing half for Cork United, West Ham United and Preston North End. He made over 300 appearances in the Football League. He played for the Republic of Ireland national team, making nine appearances between 1952 and 1959. O'Farrell died on 6 March 2022, at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Irish footballers Category:Irish football managers Category:Preston North End F.C. players Category:West Ham United F.C. players
title: Frank O'Farrell
